## Feature Summary
A brief description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem/Use Case
What problem does this feature solve? Or what use case does it enable?

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you think this feature should work. Include:
- User interface changes
- New controls or interactions
- Visual changes
- Gameplay mechanics

## Alternative Solutions
If you've considered alternatives, describe them here.

## Additional Context
Add any other context, mockups, or examples that help illustrate the feature.

## Implementation Notes
If you have technical suggestions:
- Code changes needed
- Performance considerations
- Browser compatibility
- Mobile support
